bug.author: Zumbalamambo
bug.summary: Unable to convert PCD to PLY
bug.description:
I'm using the following code to convert PCD file to PLY. <denchmark-code>import open3d as o3d
print("Testing IO for point cloud ...") pcd = o3d.io.read_point_cloud("pointcloud.pcd") print(pcd) o3d.io.write_point_cloud("copy_of_fragment.ply", pcd) </denchmark-code>
Unfortunately the converted Pointcloud looks messy in blender. Is this the proper way of doing it?

comments.comment: This is the correct way. Can you please provide the ply file (or a similar one) that produces the problem. It would also be good to show screenshots of loading the ply and the pcd in Blender.
